title:
Is there any where you can go to find out about upcoming events in Wilmington (like the ask a lawyer event at independence mall.)  Most people don\'t know about many of these events until after they are over.



Thanks,

RJ Jenkins
text:
Most local events are listed at http://www.starnewsonline.com/



A calendar of events is at
http://boxoffice.printtixusa.com/wilmingtontickets/eventcalendar
